components/common/responsive-img: {{!-- This file implements the lazysizes srcset pattern (as seen on https://github.com/aFarkas/lazysizes#modern-transparent-srcset-pattern) for maximum performance on modern browsers and reasonable compatibility with legacy browsers. There are a few important arguments to know about when using this component: `lazyload`: - If set to 'lazyload+lqip', will load a low-res image which will be replaced by lazysizes - ensuring that SOME content is shown immediately on page load. Without LQIP, a transparent gif will be used instead, which reduces the number of requests needed to load the page, making it even faster. - If set to 'lazyload', the browser will not load the full-size image at first, instead the lazysizes plugin will load it progressively after page load. This improves the load speed of the page, but it should be disabled for high-priority above-the-fold images. - If set to 'disabled', will not attempt to lazyload the image and instead tell the browser to load it immediately. Use this for high-priority images that are above the fold. `fallback_size`: This is the size to use for this image in legacy browsers that do not support srcset. Can be defined as a pixel bounding-box size (e.g. "123x123) or inherent width (e.g. "123w"). `class`: The CSS classes to add to the image, e.g. "card-image". If lazyloading is enabled, all images will have the "lazyload" class so that lazysizes will target them automatically. `otherAttributes`: Any other HTML attributes you want on the img tag, for example "height='100' width='100'" `default_image`: The default image to use if `image` is undefined or falsy. Should be a theme asset, usually defined as a relative path in the theme config. If a default image is not provided, you'll get an image tag with no image if the primary image is undefined. `lqip_size`: If you want to specify a particular size for the LQIP image, you can do so with this argument. A default of 80 pixels wide will be used otherwise. This argument has no effect if the lazyload mode is not "lazyload+lqip". --}}

components/products/custom-dye-sublimati:
Requesting a Quote

  • Sublimation will only work best on 100% white polyester garment and treated surfaces
  • Can work on other types of garments such as 50/50 blends and cotton
  • Press onto other light colored garments but note that it will not be as vibrant as it will take on the color of the garment
  • Artwork quality must be higher than 300 dpi resolution or vector images
  • Please upload the artwork using the Request a Quote form
  • Production can take 1-3 business days to complete your order. If a longer timeline is needed, the artist will contact you via email or phone.
  • If pressing on anything other than fabric, please call for further instructions as this will change how HTW prints your designs. 
  • Orders do not qualify for free freight.
  • Does NOT print Neons or Pantone colors.
components/products/custom-full-color-di:
Send in your own artwork to receive a free quote/proof!

  • Full color
  • Photo-realistic quality
  • Unlimited colors (no pantones/neons)
  • Ideal for patterns, shading, and multi-colored designs
  • Must meet our 10 transfer (per artwork) and/or $30 order minimum
  • Can be used on most hard surfaces
  • NOT a heat transfer
  • Allow 1-3 business days turnaround time before shipment
  • All graphics will have at least 0.125" (1/8") white border or safe area added to them upon printing

Requesting a Quote

  • Send in your own artwork to receive a free quote/proof
  • Full color
  • Photo-realistic quality
  • Unlimited colors (no Pantones/neons)
  • Ideal for patterns, shading, and multi-colored designs
  • Must meet our 10 transfer (per artwork) and/or $30 order minimum
  • Can be used on most materials
  • Allow 1-3 business days turnaround time before shipment
  • All graphics will have a white border or safe area added to them upon printing
components/products/custom-rhinestone-tr:
Requesting a Quote

In order to receive a quote, please use the Request a Quote button found in the description area of this page. We will need the following information to complete the quote:

  • Contact information
  • Image of artwork.
    • Acceptable formats: JPG file, PDF file, Adobe Illustrator file, EPS file
  • Color of preferred stones
  • Dimensions of design in Width (w) and Height (h)
    • 14x14 inch maximum
  • Quantity of transfers
    • 10 transfers minimum
components/products/custom-sticky-dye-su:
Send in your own artwork to receive a free quote/proof!

  • Requesting a quote section with all the bullets add at the top:
    • Transfers are NOT sticky to the touch but when activated with heat the transfer will adhere to your garment for pressing.
    • Eliminates the need for thermal spray or tape
    • NOT recommended for hard surfaces
  • Sublimation will only work best on 100% white polyester garment and treated surfaces
  • Can work on other types of garments such as 50/50 blends and cotton
  • Press onto other light colored garments but note that it will not be as vibrant as it will take on the color of the garment
  • Artwork quality must be higher than 300 dpi resolution or vector images
components/products/custom-wall-decal-in:
Send in your own artwork to receive a free quote/proof!

  • Price will be based on Square inches
  • Artwork: Must be one of the following:
    • Vectored graphics from Adobe illustrator or Corel Draw
    • Over 300dpi Resolution images
  • Minimum Charge of $15.00
  • Can be hand placed
  • Great for Banks, Gyms, Offices, Coffeeshops, Schools, Classrooms and more
  • Easily removable from all painted surfaces
  • Great for promotional events
  • Matte finish
